entry.title: Learning Materials of Machine Learning
entry.content:
I would like to list all the Machine Learning materials that I collected from Internat.

Entry Level Online Course

  • Machine Learning, Prof. Andrew Ng, Standford University: Coursera
  • Machine Learning Foundations, Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin, National Taiwan University: Coursera
  • Machine Learning Techniques, Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin, National Taiwan University: Coursera
  • Machine Learning and haveing it deep and structured, Prof. Hung-yi Lee, National Taiwan University: Website
  • Machine Learning, University of Oxford: Website
  • CS231n: Convolutional Neural Networks for Visual Recognition, Standford University: Youtube Course material Website

Advance Online Course

Origin recommend course list is post in Reddit

  • Advanced Introduction to ML, CMU: Youtube, Course Material Website
  • Large Scale ML, Toronto: Website
  • Statistical Learning Theory and Applications, MIT: Youtube, Course Material Website
  • Regularization Methods for ML: Youtube, Course Material Website
  • Statistical ML, CMU: Youtube, Course Material Website
  • Convex Optimization, CMU: Youtube, Course Material Website
  • Probabilistic Graphical Model, CMU: Course Material Website
  • Statistical Learning Theory, UC Berkeley: Course Material Website
  • Machine Learning for Computer Vision, TU Munchen: Courville Materials Website

Online Books

  • Deep Learning Book, Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio and Aaron Courville: Book
  • Standford Machine Learning Materials: Books
  • CS231n: Convolutional Neural Networks for Visual Recognition: Website
  • Convex Optimization: Books

Blogs

  • Andrej Karpathy blog: Blogs
  • Off the Convex Path: Blogs
  • Paper Summary for Deep Learning Research (Simplified Chinese): Blogs
  • Charles H Martin blog: Blogs
